Html:
Hi,

I using the GMAP.net windows form controls for a own project.

The GMAP.NET is greate and I can only say: THANKS a lot for this greate piece of work!!!!!!!!!!!!"

But how it works with offline maps??

How I can use the tool offline with maps from the cache?

How ein can put a special area in all zoom levels in the cache to use it offline.

 

What can I do with the EXPORT and IMPORT function ??

 

Can any body explain me this.

 

Thanks in advanced,

 

martin
in order to get data into the cache, you can use prefetch functions in demos, there you can set the area and zoom levels, import/export just for moving data into different cache database file

You have a example for me, in VB.net or C# ??

 

What I will do is to "save" a defined area in all zoom levels in a file.

Then I will be abled to load the file and can use the software in the ranges of the saved area offline.

 

martin
in order to get data into the cache, you can use prefetch functions in demos, there you can set the area and zoom levels, import/export just for moving data into different cache database file
